headline: Does American Express' Minimum SCB Signal Strong Capital Discipline?
summary: AXP maintains its Fed-set capital buffer, unlocking more flexibility for dividend growth, buybacks and strategic investments.

raw.headline: Does American Express' Minimum SCB Signal Strong Capital Discipline?

headline: 2 No-Brainer Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy Right Now
summary: Amazon is the hands-down leader in e-commerce and cloud computing.  American Express had an impressive first quarter and is poised for more growth.  One of the most important aspects of investing like Buffett is to hold on to stocks for the long term.

headline: Jim Cramer Says “I Want American Express”
summary: American Express Company (NYSE:AXP) is one of the 21 stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar. Expressing his bullishness on the company, Cramer remarked: “Okay, this is a very hard question because Visa and MasterCard are valued much more highly, I think, than American Express in terms of PE multiple. I want American Express of these three, […]
